tags: None
review:
First, the appointment process and confirmation was hassle free. Clinic was easy to find as it was off 100 Feet Road in a calm street. Me and my wife were little worried as this is my first visit to a Dentist for my kid and it was a wonderful experience to say the least.

The Doctor is super cool and took a lot of time to explain the nuances of the issue, preventive measures to be taken both for the kid and parents and listed out the alternative modes of treatment.

We really enjoyed the session at the clinic and my kid was happily interacting with the doctor. Been a long long time to have such an experience with Doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am a retired (73 yrs old) Scientist. The Doctor was recommended by my wife who had gone earlier to her  for similar problem. I was fully satisfied on the first day itself when she explained the problem I had after preliminary examination. I agreed to her course of treatment and completed successfully. She is very friendly, pleasant  and highly capable. She has got a very good clinic with all necessary gadgets. All my appointments were fine and I never waited for too long.  I strongly recommend her for all dental related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had tooth ache and sensitivity which was unbearable. The Doctor exactly  fixed the problem and explained the reason due to which I was suffering and about the treatment to be given .  I am very much satisfied with the treatment and  really happy to be treated by a ******* professional with expertise.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was having my teeth issue for long years and i was suffering with lots of pain.. basically I was afraid of doing root canal. But once Dr.Chandrakala did me the root canal treatment it was really very comfortable from my side and she is very polite and co operative with the patient. All the sittings were very perfect and now I am happy with the treatment..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Artificial Teeth,Dentures, Crowns and Bridges,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: We went for treating my father who is 85 years old. She treated with exceptional care. Best follow up. Appointment times are well maintained. We have not waited for any of our visits. Best care. Punctual. Tidy. Peaceful. I would recommend for an comfortable experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We went for an oral surgical procedure for my nine year old son whose front tooth was unerupted. The dentist made the surgery very painfree and comfortable for my son. The procedure was successful! Dr Chendrakala had a very professional but friendly approach and answered all our queries patiently. I would definitely recommend coming to this clinic for any future treatment!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My two front teeth got damaged and needed capping. The base was very small, hence capping can't be done. Doctor had implanted screws and then capping was done. Now I'm feeling better and I am using both of them for biting. Everything is fine. Thanks to the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I visited Dr. Chandrakala for teeth cleaning. I liked her friendliness,the clinic maintenance,also for the perfect care shown towards patients *** ********* ********* ***** ** ***. Dr. Chandrakala explained how to take care of our teeth really well. She understands the problem of the patient and treats them accordingly. I would strongly recommend her for any dental problem ** *** ** ****** ******* *** *********** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ****** ******* **** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ******** *** ******* ** ********* ** ************ * I got a permanent solution to close a small gap in my canine teeth. Clinic ambience , treatment, minimal wait time are all spot-on. I would recommend every citizen across geographies to come and visit this clinic to get their teeth problems sorted-out permanently

tags: None
review:
I come from  USA specifically to get treatment  from Dr Kala. Her quality of service is the same and sometime even better than American dentists. You can feel safe and assured that your dentist knows the **** *** *** medical ethics is top of the class - this is a rare quality today among doctors. 
Deepan.
California

review: The doctor was very friendly and I felt like I was treated by family relative.the doctor shows a lot of care towards patient.she gives at most care so that there won't be any pain.the doctor doesn't do any complicated procedures unless bit is really necessary. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I never thought of being happy after visiting a dentist for a wisdom tooth extraction but to my surprise things got really better and easier and I got recovered very soon without any sufferings. I came to know about this clinic through one of my friend as he gave a very good feedback and now I know why.. I personally felt the ambience hygiene and fresh Dr.chandrakala is so very friendly and she went a step above giving me all the medical advice that I need to follow not only for oral health but also motivated me for physical wellness. I am very much satisfied with the treatment and the fees. I would rate 5/5 certainly.. If you are looking for a dentist right now this is the perfect place...

review: I work in Dubai and visited the clinic during my vacation  .I had an amazing deep cleansing session thanks to Dr. chandrakala ,She has clearly explained how to maintain the oral hygiene daily . The equipment and facilities are to international  standards . I would highly recomend friends and relatives , As the doctor is true professional and services are to world class at low price in india.

review:
I took my mother-in-law for a tooth extraction and both my mother-in-law and myself are very happy with the treatment. Dr Chendrakala explained the procedure very clearly to us. Her work was meticulous and thorough. 
Later I took my sons for getting their teeth cleaned and the doctor was very friendly and made them feel very relaxed. The staff also were cordial . I am glad I chose this clinic and would wholeheartedly recommend to all my friends and relatives. Thank u doctor.
